languages.text: "Оправдание, недостойное губернатора мира". {n}Меж нахмуренных бровей Леди-Навигатора проступает тонкая морщинка.{/n} "Вы жаждете вознаграждения за верную службу и гордитесь жертвой, которую не должны были приносить. Мир отвернулся от вас, Вистенца. А теперь и Бог-Император".

"An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Оправдание, недостойное губернатора мира". {n}Меж нахмуренных бровей Леди-Навигатора проступает тонкая морщинка.{/n} "Вы жаждете вознаграждения за верную службу и гордитесь жертвой, которую не должны были приносить. Мир отвернулся от вас, Вистенца. А теперь и Бог-Император".

The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

"An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

"An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

"An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

"An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

languages.text: 「惑星の総督としてふさわしくない説明ですね」{n} カシアのふくれっ面の間に細い線が浮かび上がる。{/n}「忠実な奉仕への報いを期待し、出すべきではなかった犠牲について自慢をする。世界はあなたに背中を向けたのですよ、ヴィステンツァ。そして今や、神帝陛下も」
languages.original_text: "An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「惑星の総督としてふさわしくない説明ですね」{n} カシアのふくれっ面の間に細い線が浮かび上がる。{/n}「忠実な奉仕への報いを期待し、出すべきではなかった犠牲について自慢をする。世界はあなたに背中を向けたのですよ、ヴィステンツァ。そして今や、神帝陛下も」

languages.text: « Cette explication n'est pas digne d'une gouverneure. {n}Une ride se forme entre les sourcils froncés de Cassia.{/n} Vous pensez être récompensée pour avoir rendu service au nom de la foi et vous vous vantez d'avoir effectué un sacrifice qui n'avait pas lieu d'être. Le monde vous a tourné le dos, Vistenza. Et l'Empereur-Dieu est sur le point d'en faire de même. »
languages.original_text: "An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Cette explication n'est pas digne d'une gouverneure. {n}Une ride se forme entre les sourcils froncés de Cassia.{/n} Vous pensez être récompensée pour avoir rendu service au nom de la foi et vous vous vantez d'avoir effectué un sacrifice qui n'avait pas lieu d'être. Le monde vous a tourné le dos, Vistenza. Et l'Empereur-Dieu est sur le point d'en faire de même. »

languages.text: “身为总督，竟然找这样的借口，实在是太不体面了。”{n}卡西娅皱起的眉毛之间出现了一条细线。{/n}“你打算靠自表忠心来赢得奖赏，还夸耀你本不该做出的牺牲。这个世界已经抛弃了你，维丝坦萨，神皇也同样如此。”
languages.original_text: "An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “身为总督，竟然找这样的借口，实在是太不体面了。”{n}卡西娅皱起的眉毛之间出现了一条细线。{/n}“你打算靠自表忠心来赢得奖赏，还夸耀你本不该做出的牺牲。这个世界已经抛弃了你，维丝坦萨，神皇也同样如此。”

languages.text: «Una explicación que dista de ser propia de la gobernadora del mundo». {n}Una fina línea aparece entre el ceño fruncido de Cassia.{/n} «Espera una recompensa por sus buenas acciones y se jacta de un sacrificio que no debería haber hecho. El mundo le da la espalda, Vistenza. Y ahora también el Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Una explicación que dista de ser propia de la gobernadora del mundo». {n}Una fina línea aparece entre el ceño fruncido de Cassia.{/n} «Espera una recompensa por sus buenas acciones y se jacta de un sacrificio que no debería haber hecho. El mundo le da la espalda, Vistenza. Y ahora también el Dios Emperador».

languages.text: "Eine Erklärung, die der Gouverneurin der Welt unwürdig ist." {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn. Eine dünne Falte erscheint zwischen ihren Augenbrauen.{/n} "Ihr erwartet, für treuen Dienst belohnt zu werden, und prahlt mit einem Opfer, das Ihr niemals hättet erbringen sollen. Die Welt hat Euch den Rücken zugekehrt, Vistenza. Und nun hat das auch der Gottimperator getan."
languages.original_text: "An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Erklärung, die der Gouverneurin der Welt unwürdig ist." {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn. Eine dünne Falte erscheint zwischen ihren Augenbrauen.{/n} "Ihr erwartet, für treuen Dienst belohnt zu werden, und prahlt mit einem Opfer, das Ihr niemals hättet erbringen sollen. Die Welt hat Euch den Rücken zugekehrt, Vistenza. Und nun hat das auch der Gottimperator getan."

languages.text: "Valiliğe sığmayan bir mazeret..." {n}Cassia'nın çatık kaşları arasında ince bir çizgi beliriyor.{/n} "Sadık hizmetin için ödüllendirilmeyi ve kati suretle yapmaman gereken bir fedakârlık için övülmeyi bekliyorsun. Dünyanın verdiği karşılığı gördün Vistenza. Tanrı İmparator da gördü."
languages.original_text: "An explanation unworthy of the world's governor." {n}A thin line appears between Cassia's furrowed eyebrows.{/n} "You expect to be rewarded for faithful service and boast about a sacrifice you should never have made. The world has turned its back on you, Vistenza. And now, so has the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Valiliğe sığmayan bir mazeret..." {n}Cassia'nın çatık kaşları arasında ince bir çizgi beliriyor.{/n} "Sadık hizmetin için ödüllendirilmeyi ve kati suretle yapmaman gereken bir fedakârlık için övülmeyi bekliyorsun. Dünyanın verdiği karşılığı gördün Vistenza. Tanrı İmparator da gördü."
